rename.description: Rename mask for the output file, which will be the [name] placeholder for Asset Modules.

fetchFileExt.description: Allows to overwrite the default extension for fetch files (JSON format containing the URL to the remote image).

cacheDownloads.description: Allow to store downloaded remote images in cacheDir.

cacheResults.description: Allow to store result (optimized) images in cacheDir.

cacheDir.description: A path where cache files will be stored (absolute path recommended).

cacheDuration.description: Sets how long a cached item (optimization/fetch result) is valid.

beforeFetch.description: Allows to modify URL and fetchOptions before fetching a remote image.
